info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 12:25AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Washington and central Iron Counties through 115 AM MDT... At 1224 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles southwest of Cedar City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cedar City, Kanarraville, Hamilton Fort and Lund. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 44 and 55. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 46 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
